archiefmat.titel: Register van testamenten, codicillen en superscripties op besloten testamenten en codicillen. Geregistreerd 1816 - 1841
archiefmat.titel_eng: Register of last will and testaments, codicils and superscriptions on sealed last will and testaments and codicils. Registered in the period 1816 - 1841
archiefmat.notes:
Period: 7 September 1815 - 27 September 1841

 

No. 685: registered deeds from the period September 1815 - February 1816 were transferred to this no. 896. Nos. 896-897 contain an alphabetical index of names. The dates mentioned are the dates of registration, not the dates the original documents were drawn up.
